remarks: Deduce betweenness from "less than" relation.  Corresponds loosely to Proposition 6.13 of [Schwabhauser] p. 45.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Aug-2019.)
statement:
legval.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
legval.d $e |- .- = ( dist ` G ) $.
legval.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
legval.l $e |- .<_ = ( leG ` G ) $.
legval.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
legid.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. P ) $.
legid.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. P ) $.
legtrd.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. P ) $.
legtrd.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. P ) $.
legbtwn.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( A e. ( C I B ) \/ B e. ( C I A ) ) ) $.
legbtwn.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( C .- A ) .<_ ( C .- B ) ) $.
legbtwn $p |- ( ph -> A e. ( C I B ) ) $.
